Module Plager
Package com.g28.plager.Antlr.PreProcessors

Class CPreProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.g28.plager.Antlr.PreProcessors.PreProcessor
com.g28.plager.Antlr.PreProcessors.CPreProcessor
public class CPreProcessor extends PreProcessor
The C Preprocessor class applies the C grammar file, a selection of standards that define a C program. The class's main functionality is to remove unnecessary information (preprocessor directives) and parse important information
